name: Housewife simulator (hadios)
description:
You just moved into a brand new house, with a spoilt little baby, a spoilt husband and spoilt toilets. How do you balance out household chores and your family members requests without being exhausted?! And, can you do them all before the treehouse gets cut down?

Controls

Move - Left/Right Arrow key

Jump - Z

Pick up/Use item - X

Developed by

Programmer: Hadi, Kang Soon

Art: Lois 

Music: Hanif
